text: Ptericoptomimus truncatus is a species of beetle in the Cerambycidae family, and the only species in the genus Ptericoptomimus. It was described by Melzer in 1935.Biolib.cz - Ptericoptomimus truncatus. Retrieved September 8, 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1935 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Ptericoptomimus
